segments.text: Mike , come and look at this painting of shrimp ! It is so simple yet so vivid !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It is incredible ! Is it the work of Qi Bakshi ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . How do you know that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Qi is famous all over the world , isn ’ t he ? Besides I am quite interested in Chinese painting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool ! What kind of Chinese painting do you prefer , free sketch or claborate-style painting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer free sketch , especially the landscape paintings . I can always feel peace and harmony from those landscape paintings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true . Chinese art stresses the harmony between man and nature , which is an important part of China's traditional culture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So do I . Let ’ s go to other areas to see what they have got , shall we ?
segments.speaker: S1
